text: Cheongna International City () is a station of the AREX in Gyeongseo-dong, Seo District, Incheon, South Korea. It is situated near the entrance of the Incheon International Airport Expressway. It has an unusual design: the first building is built for access to the station, and the second building, which houses the platforms, is connected to the first building with a skybridge. ==Station layout== {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |- |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=50 valign=top|G |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100 valign=top|Street Level |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border- bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=400 valign=top|Exits |- |style="border- bottom:solid 0 gray;" width=50 valign=top|L1 |style="border-bottom:solid 0 gray;" width=100 valign=top|Concourse |style="border-bottom:solid 0 gray;" width=500 valign=top|Faregates, Ticketing Machines, Station Control |- |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" rowspan=3 valign=top|L2 Platforms |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;"|Eastbound |style="border- top:solid 1px gray;"|→ AREX Local toward Incheon International Airport Terminal 2 (Yeongjong) → → AREX Express does not stop here → |- |style="border-top:solid 2px black;border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border- bottom:solid 2px black;text-align:center;" colspan=2|Island platform, doors will open on the right |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Westbound |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|← AREX Local toward Seoul (Geomam City) ← AREX Express does not stop here |} ==External links== Category:Railway stations opened in 2014 Category:Metro stations in Incheon Category:Seo District, Incheon Category:AREX Category:2014 establishments in South Korea Category:Transport in South Korea
title: Cheongna International City station
